title: Knockbacks

description: Episode number 6 of Series "Six of the best". Introduces issues about employers and the workplace, casual work and family relationships. Antoni finds a short lived labouring job; Brian walks off his job after an argument with the foreman; Sal is still looking for work in the face of lack of family understanding and Brian's father is retrenched.
